## Suggested tools

Testing out a table layout for common office tools. A variation on the resources page.

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(kableExtra)
library(janitor)


all <- read_csv("tech-table.csv") %>%
  mutate(
    tool = paste0('<a href="', url, '">', tool, "</a>")
  ) %>%
  select(tool, notes, type) 

DT::datatable(all, escape = FALSE, rownames = FALSE, options = list(dom = "ft"))


```
